quiz-intro: In this test, you will find a set of statements. Select the statement from the grid that resonates with you the most. You can change your answers until time runs out or until you confirm your choices.
third-quiz: In the third and final test, we will present statements to you and want to know if you agree or not.
shop-intro-text: You are going on a long journey where everything you need for life is available. What items would you take with you on your journey to feel comfortable and safe? What items would you take to ward off boredom and develop skills? Which Vivaarium store items resonate with you the most? Get to know our store and select 9 items to take with you on your journey. Don't rush. Think it through. And finally, confirm your shopping cart.
Lemmikautori maali repro: Reproduction of a Favorite Author's Painting
Inimene on planeedi viirus: Human is a virus to the planet
Inimene on oma maaga üks: Human is one with the Earth
Inimene on maailma valitseja: Human is the ruler of the world
Inimese saatus ei olene planeedist: The fate of a human does not depend on the planet
Suurema eesmärgi nimel võib suhteid rikk: In the pursuit of a greater goal, relationships can be damaged
Oskan leida inimestega ühise keele: I can find common ground with people
Ühiskond vajab rohkem korda, et keskkond: Society needs more order to prevent environmental destruction
Minu jaoks on kõige olulisem isiklik vab: Personal freedom is most important to me
Suurem osa kunsti on puhas ressursi rais: Most art is pure resource waste
Kunst on minu arust üllaim kõigist tegev: Art is, in my opinion, the noblest of all activities
Kunsti naudid siis, kui töö on tehtud: Art is enjoyed when the work is done
Jumal on kodumaa nägu: God is the face of the homeland
Religioon on hea töövahend inimeste suun: Religion is a good tool for guiding people
Religioonide aeg on läbi: The era of religions is over
Eesmärk on otsida tasakaalu keskkonnaga: The goal is to seek balance with the environment
Eesmärk on kulgeda iseenda parimas jõesä: The goal is to flow in one's own best riverbed
Ülesanne on jätkata sugu: The task is to continue the lineage
Eesmärk on pidevalt areneda koos tehnolo: The goal is to constantly evolve with technology
Olevik on tähtsaim: The present is the most important
Minevik on tähtsaim: The past is the most important
Tulevik on tähtsaim: The future is the most important
Sa saad vastuseid muuta kuni aeg otsa sa: You can change your answers until time runs out or until you confirm your choices.
Lastetutele täiskasvanutele peaks alates: Childless adults should be taxed starting from the age of 30.
Inimkond kolib varem või hiljem täieliku: Humanity will sooner or later move entirely into virtual reality.
Eesti keele kaitsmiseks pole ükski meede: No measure is superfluous to protect the Estonian language.
Inimkonna tulevik saab siin planeedil jä: The future of humanity on this planet can only continue by abandoning capitalism.
Tuleviku inimene ei vaja hakkamasaamisek: The future human does not need a community to cope.
Edukas on vaid selline ühiskond, kus ini: Only a society where people fulfill their traditional roles is successful.
Rahvariie ning laulu- ja tantsupidu kuul: Folk costume and song and dance festivals belong only to Estonians.
Rahvaarvu vähenemine on tõhusaim viis ke: Reducing the population is the most effective way to overcome environmental problems.
